tr: Kalabalık caddede ayaküstü bir buluşma yaptık.

en: We pulled together to get out of hardship.
We should help people in need.
We are leaving for Hawaii tonight.
We are to meet him at seven this evening.
We must look after her children this evening.
tr: Bu akşam onun çocuklarına göz kulak olmalıyız.

en: We have been invited to dinner this evening.
We've been invited to dinner this evening.
We had better not stay up too late tonight.
tr: Bu gece çok geç yatmasak iyi olur.

en: We have a party this evening.
We are in for an unusually hot summer this year.
tr: Bu yıl alışılmadık derecede sıcak bir yaz bizi bekliyor.

en: We're in for an unusually hot summer this year.
tr: Bu yıl alışılmadık derecede sıcak bir yaz bizi bekliyor.

en: It looks as though we shall have to go without a holiday this year.
tr: Bu yıl tatil yapamayacakmışız gibi görünüyor.

en: We are hoping to visit Spain this summer.
tr: Bu yaz İspanya'yı ziyaret etmeyi umuyoruz.

en: We had an examination in mathematics today.
We are at home today.
We will be at home today.
We're going to stay at home today.
We'll be at home today.
We must adapt to today's harsh realities.
We'll go on a picnic next Sunday.
We will have been studying English for five years next February.
tr: Gelecek Şubat'ta beş yıldır İngilizce çalışıyor olacağız.

en: We are to pay back the money within the week.
We cannot earn our bread with the present wages.
We still believe it true that he is innocent.
We are still clinging to the dreams of our youth.
We've played a lot of matches this season.
I have a black and a white dog.
tr: Bir siyah ve bir beyaz köpeğim var.

en: I have a black dog and a white dog.
tr: Siyah bir köpeğim ve beyaz bir köpeğim var.

en: We have to act now.
We tried hard to get first prize in the chorus contest.
tr: Koro yarışmasında birinciliği almak için çok uğraştık.

en: We put up the flags on national holidays.
We are high school students.
We borrowed money at high interest.
We study many subjects in high school.
We came back by way of Hong Kong.
We have no choice but to go.
We criticized her for her behavior.
We've tried every conceivable method, but absolutely nothing works.
tr: Aklımıza gelen her yöntemi denedik ama hiçbir şey işe yaramıyor.

en: We are happy.
We're happy.
We must keep the law to live happily.
We took advantage of the good weather to play tennis.
tr: Tenis oynamak için güzel havadan faydalandık.

en: We took advantage of the sunny weather to go on a picnic.
tr: Pikniğe gitmek için güneşli havayı değerlendirdik.

en: We act without fear or favor.
We must think further about public morality.
tr: Kamu ahlakı üzerine daha fazla düşünmeliyiz.

en: We took a walk in the park.
We ran around the park.
We sat on the bench in the park.
We got together in the park.
We happened to meet her in the park.
We often played house in the park.
We took a back road to avoid the heavy traffic.
tr: Yoğun trafiğe takılmamak için ara yoldan gittik.

en: We know how to get around traffic congestion.
We were held up for half an hour in the traffic and so we arrived late.
tr: Trafikte yarım saat oyalandık da o yüzden geç kaldık.

en: We alternated in cleaning the room.
It is easy for us to make many mistakes.
We talked and talked until the day broke.
We were studying all afternoon.
We were arriving in Chicago at 9:00 p.m.
We were to have taken off at 4:30 p.m.
We met at two in the afternoon.
We sat down to dinner in opposition to each other.
We helped one another.
We helped each other.
We are bound to each other by a close friendship.
We live many miles distant from each other.
We consoled each other.
We arrived at the station at five.
We set a trap to catch a fox.
We went fishing in the lake.
We went swimming in the lake.
We came in view of the lake.
We walked along the shore of the lake.
We enjoyed swimming in the lake.
We had no notion of leaving our hometown.
tr: Memleketimizden ayrılmak gibi bir düşüncemiz yoktu.

en: We learn about ancient Rome and Greece.
tr: Antik Roma ve Yunanistan hakkında bilgi ediniyoruz.

en: We bought a used train car.
tr: İkinci el bir tren vagonu aldık.

en: We are trying to do away with the old customs.
We did so after an old custom.
We saw some old houses pulled down.
We must respect the rights of the individual.
We use words to communicate.
We express our thoughts by means of languages.
We should make use of atomic energy.
We should never use an atomic bomb again.
tr: Bir daha asla atom bombası kullanmamalıyız.

en: We climbed up the steep mountain.
We climbed the steep slope.
We see what we expect to see.
We named the dog Pochi.
We keep three dogs and a cat.
tr: Üç köpeğimiz ve bir kedimiz var.

en: We often eat foods which are harmful to our health without knowing it.
tr: Farkında olmadan sık sık sağlığımıza zararlı yiyecekler yeriz.

en: We learned that the moon goes around the earth.
We are related by blood.
We are busy preparing for our wedding and honeymoon.

en: We are dating with a view to marriage.
We will become happy in the long run.
We must make up our minds, and soon!

en: Let us give you a piece of advice.

We're accustomed to wearing shoes.

en: We looked at the sky, but couldn't see any stars.

en: We deposit money in a bank.

en: We wish to invite Peter to Japan in the near future.

en: We walked along a narrow path.

en: We must clean our classroom.

en: We are afraid.

en: We make milk into butter.
